param.name: ppidl
param.para: The address of a pointer to the item identifier list to get.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets a persisted item identifier list.

param.name: pidl
param.para: A pointer to the item identifier list to set.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that are used to persist item identifier lists.
